main event: A civilian reported witnessing an unidentified aerial phenomenon in Freeville, New York on August 21, 1968.
interesting points: The object exhibited a bluish color with a white bottom and was described as having a flat top and an oval bottom., The sighting lasted approximately 10 to 15 seconds., The phenomenon was stationary at first and then accelerated rapidly before disappearing., The witness estimated the object to be about the size of a car headlight at a distance of one mile., There were no other confirmed witnesses to the event.
witness description: The witness was a female, 19 years old and a graduate school student.
